title: Number Line
text: The problem can be solved by drawing a number line of length $$75$$ and separating it into $$18$$ equal parts.
speech: The problem can be solved by drawing a number line of length  75  and separating it into  18  equal parts.
pacedSpeech: The problem can be solved by drawing a number line of length   75

title: Fraction
text: The separation of the number line can be represented as a fraction or a decimal.
speech: The separation of the number line can be represented as a fraction or a decimal.
pacedSpeech: The separation of the number line can be represented as a fraction or a decimal.

title: Simplify
text: The process can be made easier by noticing both the length of the ribbon and the number of students are divisible by $$6$$
speech: The process can be made easier by noticing both the length of the ribbon and the number of students are divisible by  6
pacedSpeech: The process can be made easier by noticing both the length of the ribbon and the number of students are divisible by   6
